description: Three years before the letter of intent for One Dalton was filed
Two years before the letter of intent for One Dalton was filed
One year before the letter of intent for One Dalton was filed

The lettter of intent stated that the Belvidere/Dalton Site will be improved with two buildings: a hotel/residential structure (including restaurants) (the High-Rise Building) ...and a residential structure (with a small amount of street-level retail use).

The cooperation agreement detailed community benefits including $1,495.3000 toward neighborhood housing trust payment, employment outreach, streetscape improvements, bird safety commitment and others.

Initially established in 2014, the agreement outlines affordable housing commitments for a project located at 1-7 Dalton Street, Boston. It requires the creation of affordable housing units to comply with a city executive order. One Dalton is responsible for fulfilling these commitments, initially through off-site rental units and later through a combination of rental and for-sale units. The amendment extends the period of affordability for for-sale units and adjusts income eligibility criteria for certain units within the project.
Construction completed with a total cost of 700 million dollars. The building totals 61 floors and is 706,000 sq ft.
